item.title: Moving GameOn to Kubernetes
item.description: Game On! and Kubernetes Here at Game On! central, we've been considering how to run on Kubernetes for quite some time, and during a pause in the recent Holiday Season, we had a chance to add Kubernetes support allowing you to run the core services locally. This work partly builds on an earlier attempt to bring Game On! to Kubernetes back in May last year. We learnt a few lessons from that attempt, and like to think this attempt is a little cleaner.
